title: Ecological Dynamic Training Environment Design for Soccer Shooting Skill Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic soccer skills and understanding of instructional design theories
context.additional_context: A competency-building course for pre-service/in-service teachers in designing soccer skills training

learning_goals: Learners will be able to design at least three soccer shooting training scenarios based on ecological dynamics principles.
Learners will be able to analyze 1-2 touch shooting training environments considering changes in defender proximity.
Learners will be able to implement dynamic training environments reflecting real-game situations using mobile devices.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
